This page contains the notes for **the second part of R Workshop Module 5: Statistical modeling with R**, which is part of the R Workshop series prepared by ICJIA Research Analyst [Bobae Kang](http://www.icjia.state.il.us/biographies/bobae-kang) to enable and encourage ICJIA researchers to take advantage of R, a statistical programming language that is one of the most powerful modern research tools.
